en-IN.summary: Learn Patty Vaithiyam to get well soon
examplePhrases: Alexa ask patty Vaithiyam home remedy for dry cough
Alexa tell me list of patti vaithiyam
en-IN.name: Patty Vaithiyam
en-IN.description:
Ask for Patty Vaithiyam, and learn about what really matters, to keep healthy.

Patty Vaithiyam helps providing whole family guaranteed healthier and stronger.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Patty Vaithiyam" or "Alexa, open Patty Vaithiyam".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
